name: Doodle Mobile Ltd
description: Provider of an online gaming platform designed to offer mobile games. The company's platform develops and publishes mobile social games for android-based devices, enabling game enthusiasts to download them and play with their friends.
one_liner: Provider of an online gaming platform designed to offer mobile games. The company's platform develops and publishes mobile social games for android-based devices, enabling game enthusiasts to download them and play with their friends.
